entry.title: Software Craftsmanship
entry.summary:
Description

As our profession grows and matures, it becomes more and more important for us to develop a sense of what it means to be a software professional. Analogies to existing professions are easily drawn. Precision and analytical problem solving are essential. So are we engineers? Creativity and willingness to try things weâ€™ve never done are core to success. So are we artists? We are a new breed of professional that draws on but is unique from what has come before.
